title: Idyllic 17th-Century Wiltshire Manor 20 Minutes from Bath with Indoor Pool, Day Spa & Kids Club
description: Experience the perfect blend of fun and relaxation in this charmingly refurbished Jacobean family manor on the outskirts of Bradford-on-Avon and the Cotswolds. Set on a lush 14 acres perfect for morning and afternoon strolls, the property features luxury amenities, both indoor and outdoor pools, a spa with sauna and steam room and Four Bears Den Kids Club. Take time out for afternoon tea onsite, then when it's time for dinner, sit down for a meal of fresh seasonal favourites in the Orangery or wander into historic Bradford-on-Avon.
offer_address: Woolley Green, Bradford-on-Avon BA15 1TX, England, United Kingdom
